message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $9,500.  I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Could you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $8,500 is too low for this product.  Could you do $9,200?
I understand that the product is valuable, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,800?
